languages.text: "Что стало с твоими цветами, Идира? Они растворились в тебе... Нет. Ты растворилась в них. Превратилась в серое пятно".
"What has happened to your colours, Idira? They have melted into you. No, you have melted into them. You have become a grey blur."
languages.original_text: "Что стало с твоими цветами, Идира? Они растворились в тебе... Нет. Ты растворилась в них. Превратилась в серое пятно".

traits.locale_text: "What happened to your colours, Idira? They melted into you. No, you melted into them. You became a grey blur."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What happened to your colours, Idira? They melted into you. No, you melted into them. You became a grey blur."

traits.locale_text: "What has happened to your colours, Idira? They have melted into you. No, you have melted into them. You have become a grey blur."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「イディラ、いったい何があったんです？色があなたの中に溶けてしまっています。いえ、あなたが溶け込んだのでしょう。ぼやけた灰色になっています」
languages.original_text: "What has happened to your colours, Idira? They have melted into you. No, you have melted into them. You have become a grey blur."

traits.locale_text: 「イディラ、いったい何があったんです？色があなたの中に溶けてしまっています。いえ、あなたが溶け込んだのでしょう。ぼやけた灰色になっています」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你的那些颜色是怎么回事，伊迪拉？那些颜色与你融为一体，不，是你融入了它们。你变成了一片模糊的灰色。”
languages.original_text: "What has happened to your colours, Idira? They have melted into you. No, you have melted into them. You have become a grey blur."

traits.locale_text: “你的那些颜色是怎么回事，伊迪拉？那些颜色与你融为一体，不，是你融入了它们。你变成了一片模糊的灰色。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué les ha pasado a sus colores, Idira? Se han fundido con usted. No, usted se ha fundido con ellos. Ahora es un borrón gris».
languages.original_text: "What has happened to your colours, Idira? They have melted into you. No, you have melted into them. You have become a grey blur."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué les ha pasado a sus colores, Idira? Se han fundido con usted. No, usted se ha fundido con ellos. Ahora es un borrón gris».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Was ist mit Euren Farben passiert, Idira? Sie sind in Euch hineingeschmolzen. Nein, Ihr seid in sie hineingeschmolzen. Außer Grau ist nichts geblieben."
languages.original_text: "What has happened to your colours, Idira? They have melted into you. No, you have melted into them. You have become a grey blur."

traits.locale_text: "Was ist mit Euren Farben geschehen, Idira? Sie sind in Euch hineingeschmolzen. Nein, Ihr seid in sie hineingeschmolzen. Ihr seid zu einem grauen Nebel verkommen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Qu'est-il arrivé à vos couleurs, Idira ? Elles ont fondu en vous. Ou plutôt, c'est vous qui vous êtes fondue en elles. Vous n'êtes plus qu'un flou gris. »
languages.original_text: "What has happened to your colours, Idira? They have melted into you. No, you have melted into them. You have become a grey blur."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-il arrivé à vos couleurs, Idira ? Elles ont fondu en vous. Ou plutôt, c'est vous qui vous êtes fondue en elles. Vous n'êtes plus qu'un flou gris. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Renklerine ne oldu böyle İdira? İçine erimişler. Hayır, sen onların içine erimişsin. Gri bir bulanıklığa dönmüşsün."
languages.original_text: "What has happened to your colours, Idira? They have melted into you. No, you have melted into them. You have become a grey blur."

traits.locale_text: "Renklerine ne oldu böyle İdira? İçine erimişler. Hayır, sen onların içine erimişsin. Gri bir bulanıklık hâline gelmişsin."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
